name: Secrets of the Castle
description:
[WIP]

You are a ninja, in a castle, doing whatever ninjas do. But what is this castle all about?

Controls:

J or W=> Jump

A D  => Left  Right

WALL JUMP =>  When on a wall, just press the button corresponding to the opposite direction to do a wall jump. (you don't actually need to jump)
